text: Bernd Karwofsky (born 17 March 1945) is a German ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill event at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:German male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of East Germany Category:Ski jumpers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:People from Klingenthal
title: Bernd Karwofsky
